snippet.title: Sonic Action v0.1 - All Characters Gameplay
snippet.description:
After thinking about it for a long time, this will be name of project.

(Sorry for canceling old Sonic Action, level design really became a big obstacle for me. :/ )

For those who wonder what kind of game this is: 
I decided make a "remake" of old Java game from Sega Cafe called Shadow Shoot.

Basically the Alpha version is ready, private tests are going on before launching it to everyone.
